title: Fast battery drainage and heating issues on pixel 3
content: My new Pixel 3 drains battery very fast and gets heated when I use whatapp video calls or play on youtube. For example, today a 1 hour whatsapp video call dropped the charge by 30%. I have had google customer service review my settings on screen share but no good happened after all the typical suggestions they provided such as switching off , reinstalling apps etc. Infact it drains pretty fast for every app. As i wrote this the battery dropped by 5%
